text:
Hi, I am trying to create a logged call from engagement API.
It works fine but I can't set the call type. I have custom call types and I found the property is `hs_activity_type` but I still can't modify it because I can find the corresponding id or tag linked to my custom type.
Here is the metadata for 'CALL':
```metadata: {
        toNumber: 00022211133,
        status: 'COMPLETED',
        durationMilliseconds: 60000,
        body: 'description',
        hs_activity_type: 'Sales',
      },```
How can I set "call type" in a logged call from engagement API ?
Thanks very much Neal and Lance for your responses! I'll do some test! Thanks again!

Hello, I'm attempting to use the "Search the CRM" api to find contacts by a few parameters (name, phone, email). I'm able to successfully locate contacts, however I'm only able to search a limited amount (about 9 at a time) depending on whether I use filters or query. Query seems limited to a single string, while filter allows up to 9 depending on what you're providing. The problem in my specific situation is that I'm searching for specific contacts which makes the AND operator between filters within a filterGroup less useful.  Does anyone know a better way to search the crm for an array of email/phone/name without having to make multiple requests? I'm dealing with a list of ~25 contacts.

Hi <@U01CMKVMJEM> you can use mutltiple filter on a single search with no limitation of result
Please post on the community board a new issue and ping me on it. I will see with you how to achieve your search <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/bd-p/integrations>
